what_we_learned: Start with one product line to stabilize planning cadence before scaling dashboards.
what_to_reuse_next_time: Weekly planning review structure and a single page capacity snapshot.

what_we_learned: Tool consolidation works only when the release checklist is agreed first.
what_to_reuse_next_time: Default release checklist and ownership model for handoffs.

what_we_learned: A single guided onboarding route outperformed multiple choices.
what_to_reuse_next_time: One path to first value with clear prompts and measurement.
